channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-29105] KubernetesStateHandleStoreTest.testAddAndLockShouldNotThrowAlreadyExistExceptionWithSameContents failed with AssertionFailedError
